refnamediv.refpurpose: Fill a string variable with the arguments used to create a function table at k-rate.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: getftargs writes the arguments used to create a function table to a string variable. getftargs runs both at initialization and performance time.

refsect1.title: Initialization
refsect1.para: ifno -- Number of the table whose arguments we want to request.

refsect1.title: Performance
refsect1.para: ktrig -- trigger signal, should be valid at i-time. The output string variable is filled at initialization time if ktrig is positive, and at performance time whenever ktrig is both positive and different from the previous value. Use a constant value of 1 to print once at note initialization.
